sources.name: Bleacher Report
sources.description: Sports journalists and bloggers covering NFL, MLB, NBA, NHL, MMA, college football and basketball, NASCAR, fantasy sports and more. News, photos, mock drafts, game scores, player profiles and more!

sources.name: ESPN
sources.description: ESPN has up-to-the-minute sports news coverage, scores, highlights and commentary for NFL, MLB, NBA, College Football, NCAA Basketball and more.

sources.name: ESPN Cric Info
sources.description: ESPN Cricinfo provides the most comprehensive cricket coverage available including live ball-by-ball commentary, news, unparalleled statistics, quality editorial comment and analysis.

sources.name: Fox Sports
sources.description: Find live scores, player and team news, videos, rumors, stats, standings, schedules and fantasy games on FOX Sports.

sources.name: NFL News
sources.description: The official source for NFL news, schedules, stats, scores and more.

sources.name: NHL News
sources.description: The most up-to-date breaking hockey news from the official source including interviews, rumors, statistics and schedules.
